overview: Anthony Lin is the founder of Weflect, a social networked review site that covers all topics and categories. Anthony graduated from Northwestern University in 2004 with a triple major in Economics, Political Science, and International Studies. Despite having three summers of financial internships, he chose to join Accenture upon graduation, quickly becoming an SAP expert. Formally trained in SAP FI/CO, BW, Smartforms, and CRM, Anthony worked with the SAP Waldorf development team to improve their leasing solution. Anthony has consulted independently while teaching himself to program using LAMP.
